auto_link_archive.hpp

00001 #ifndef BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_AUTO_LINK_ARCHIVE_HPP
00002 #define BOOST_ARCHIVE_DETAIL_AUTO_LINK_ARCHIVE_HPP
00003 
00004 // MS compatible compilers support #pragma once
00005 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && (_MSC_VER >= 1020)
00006 # pragma once
00007 #endif
00008 
00010 //  auto_link_archive.hpp
00011 //
00012 //  (c) Copyright Robert Ramey 2004
00013 //  Use, modification, and distribution is subject to the Boost Software
00014 //  License, Version 1.0. (See accompanying file LICENSE_1_0.txt or copy at
00015 //  http://www.boost.org/LICENSE_1_0.txt)
00016 
00017 //  See library home page at http://www.boost.org/libs/serialization
00018 
00019 //----------------------------------------------------------------------------// 
00020 
00021 // This header implements separate compilation features as described in
00022 // http://www.boost.org/more/separate_compilation.html
00023 
00024 //  enable automatic library variant selection  ------------------------------// 
00025 
00026 #include <boost/archive/detail/decl.hpp>
00027 
00028 #if !defined(BOOST_ALL_NO_LIB) && !defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_NO_LIB) \
00029 &&  !defined(BOOST_ARCHIVE_SOURCE) && !defined(BOOST_WARCHIVE_SOURCE)  \
00030 &&  !defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SOURCE)
00031 
00032     // Set the name of our library, this will get undef'ed by auto_link.hpp
00033     // once it's done with it:
00034     //
00035     #define BOOST_LIB_NAME boost_serialization
00036     //
00037     // If we're importing code from a dll, then tell auto_link.hpp about it:
00038     //
00039     #if defined(BOOST_ALL_DYN_LINK) || defined(BOOST_SERIALIZATION_DYN_LINK)
00040     #  define BOOST_DYN_LINK
00041     #endif
00042     //
00043     // And include the header that does the work:
00044     //
00045     #include <boost/config/auto_link.hpp>
00046 #endif  // auto-linking disabled
00047 
00048 #endif // ARCHIVE_DETAIL_AUTO_LINK_ARCHIVE_HPP
